column2: but disappointing. I love Girl & the Goat because while it's not an every day dining experience
column3: I think the value of what you get is definitely worth the cost. Little Goat is overpriced
column5: and the food is just good. Nothing great
column7: just good. I'd rather spend $10 for corned beef hash at my local diner than $16 and then $3.50 for coffee at Little Goat. It's just really not very special.
